recipesJson.name: HoneyDew Bob's
recipesJson.author: Chewymidget
recipesJson.description:
This is obviously a little change on HoneyDEWWEY : A Boba Remix. I really loved the mix but TFA Honeydew isn't a ADV to me. This is a lot more mild as JF Honeydew isn't such a abrasive flavor as TFA's version. You can use CAP Cantaloupe here is you wish. I prefer using FA's version. I kept the TFA Circus Cotton Candy as I really liked the candy finish in the mix.

Give the original a try if you haven't yet! All credit goes to Enyawreklaw

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/3350#honeydewwey_a_boba_remix_by_enyawreklaw
